data.md:MetaData: Loss on ignition of sediment core OTTKIN, Kinnshaugen, Norway
Lake. Physiography: hilly area. Surrounding vegetation: forest. Location: centre of the lake. Device: piston corer, modified. Device diameter: 5 cm.
XXXVI International Bog ('Moor') Excursion of the Institute of Plant Sciences, University of Bern, to southern and south-eastern Norway, 8-13 September 2012
